translation: He who, being established in unity, worships Me, who dwells in all beings, that yogi abides in Me, whatever their mode of living may be.
commentary: 6.31 Sarvabhutasthitam abiding in all beings? who who? Mam Me? Bhajati worships? unity unity? established established? Absolutely in every way? present: remaining? Even also? He's that? Yogi Yogi? Mayi in Me? exists abides.Commentary He who has dissolved all duality in the underlying unity? who is thus established in unity? who worships Me? ie? who has realized Me as the Self of all? dwells always in Me? whatever
